description:
This newly designed renovated apartment is in a nice big home near Kissena Park.  Private entrance with two bedrooms, bathroom, living room, kitchen and laundry room. You will have a comfortable stay with fun memories.

近公園大別墅、二房、廳廚浴、舒適空調

Designer two-bedroom apartment includes a king-sized bed, a queen-sized bed and a futon bed in living room. This 1000 square feet apartment can take up to 6 persons. You will have a fun memories with us. 

Private entrance with Free Parking. There are ductless  air conditioners in each bedroom, a large flat-screen TV with cable in each room, a designer living room. It has all of comfort like a home with fun experience in the fashionable decorated space.

We have fruit trees, organic plants and egg-producing chickens on our property which is surrounded by a beautiful neighborhood. Our house is by beautiful Kissena park which was once a tree nursery for Central Park. 

精緻設計。獨立門出入,一千呎公寓含一大房 (皇帝號床)一小房 (皇后號床)客聽 (附舒適Futon 床)、廚房、衛浴、洗衣房。可住達六人。

近法拉盛市中心、中央公園的育樹園Kissena公園旁、鬧中取靜。提供免費停車位｡

Free parking, independent entrance, TV, Wifi, comfortable bed, closet, hair dryer, kitchen cabinet with coffee, refrigerator, microwave, electric stove, phone and printer.

舒適公寓,備中英文台電視、免費網路、大床、衣櫥、吹風機、冰箱、電子鑪、微波爐和電話、印表機。

We will provide clean bed sheets, towel, toiletry and travel guide book.

We will provide simple snacks and food in refrigerator: cereal, coffee,  tea, bottle water, and instant noodle. 

Fee service: Provide car service for airport pickup / drop. 

 我們提供乾淨床單,毛巾,衛浴用品,托鞋,旅行指南資料｡

 我們為您準備: 綠茶､咖啡､矌泉水及便利麵｡

 付費服務:提供機場接送.

10 minutes to LaGuardia airport

20 minutes to JFK airport

7minutes bus to subway station, 30 minutes subway to Manhattan. (Or 15 minutes train to Manhattan

Quiet neighborhood but close to downtown Flushing and Manhattan.

10分到LaGuardia 國內機場

20分到JFK國際機場

坐巴士10分鐘(或25分鐘走路)到法拉盛市中心地鐵站,然後30分地鉄到曼哈頓｡(或15分長島火車到曼哈頓)

清靜紐約郊區,近法拉盛華人鬧區,鬧中取靜,便利舒適｡

0.4 Mile walk to hospital, restaurants, pizza, donuts and convenience stores.

Next to Kissena park, including  a golf and tennis court

0.4 哩走路到法拉盛醫院,美國典型餐廳市集｡

0.4 哩走路到華人鬧區,如金城發超級市場,各式餐廳,點心店､餃子館,烤肉館,火鍋店等商店

Kissena湖公園旁,235m畝公園內有高爾夫球場､網球場

Other things to note
We can speak English and Chinese. We can also assist with Spanish, French and Arabic languages

 我們可以説中文,也可協助覀班牙文,法文､阿拉伯文｡
name: Designer Basement Apt 新精緻舒適含窗半地下公寓
review: Unique space with everything you'll need.
